crossfit.name: Julie Martin
crossfit.bio: With over 5 years of experience in group and personal training, Julie brings energy and expertise to every CrossFit session. Her focus on proper form and technique ensures safe and effective workouts for all levels.

crossfit.name: Thomas Durand
crossfit.bio: A former athlete with 8 years of professional coaching experience, Thomas specializes in strength and endurance training. His background in competitive sports helps him push athletes to achieve their full potential.

pilates.name: Emma Laurent
pilates.bio: Certified Pilates instructor with a passion for helping clients achieve better posture, core strength, and overall body awareness. Emma's gentle yet effective teaching style makes Pilates accessible to everyone.

pilates.name: Lucas Moreau
pilates.bio: With a background in dance and physical therapy, Lucas brings a unique perspective to Pilates instruction. He specializes in injury prevention and rehabilitation through mindful movement.

zumba.name: Maria Rodriguez
zumba.bio: Born and raised in Colombia, Maria brings authentic Latin dance energy to every class. Her infectious enthusiasm and professional dance background make her classes both fun and effective.

zumba.name: Carlos Mendez
zumba.bio: A former professional dancer turned fitness instructor, Carlos combines his passion for dance with fitness expertise. His high-energy classes are known for their perfect blend of fun and workout intensity.

mom-sessions.name: Sarah Dubois
mom-sessions.bio: Specialized in postnatal fitness and recovery, Sarah helps new mothers regain strength and confidence through safe and effective exercise programs. Her approach combines fitness expertise with maternal support.

mom-sessions.name: Marie Laurent
mom-sessions.bio: With a background in physiotherapy and maternal health, Marie specializes in creating safe and effective fitness programs for mothers at all stages of their journey.

sauna.name: Sophie Martin
sauna.bio: Dedicated to promoting holistic wellness through traditional sauna practices. Sophie combines modern wellness techniques with time-honored sauna traditions for optimal health benefits.

sauna.name: Lucas Dubois
sauna.bio: Expert in thermal therapy and wellness practices, Lucas helps clients maximize the benefits of sauna sessions through proper techniques and complementary wellness practices.

massage.name: Sophie Martin
massage.bio: Experienced massage therapist specializing in various techniques to promote relaxation, reduce stress, and improve overall well-being. Sophie's therapeutic approach addresses both physical and mental wellness.

massage.name: Lucas Dubois
massage.bio: Specialized in therapeutic massage techniques, Lucas helps clients achieve optimal physical and mental wellness through personalized massage therapy sessions.

relaxation.name: Emma Laurent
relaxation.bio: Dedicated to helping clients achieve deep relaxation and stress relief through guided sessions. Emma's calming presence and expertise create a perfect environment for relaxation and rejuvenation.

relaxation.name: Thomas Moreau
relaxation.bio: Expert in relaxation techniques and wellness practices, Thomas helps clients find balance and peace through personalized relaxation sessions and wellness guidance.
